name: AnukiClothoBattle
_source: s;Anuki;The one who ordained my father be put into his grave.|Was it you?
s;Clotho;I believe only your axe could have done that.
s;Anuki;Enough! Why did he have to die?
s;Clotho;Because he would not have accepted anything less than complete victory.|Without Simon, he would have come to rule all of Aeolia.

s;Clotho;We tire of your kind, Morrissey.{w} Of the cycle of nobility rising and falling.|Of lordlings creating an empire, only for time to erode them.|With Simon's death, there will be no more lords.|There will be space for something more... interesting.
s;Anuki;You were bored? My father is dead because you were bored?|I'll kill you! God or not, I'll tear you apart!
